original.value: Free Card

translation.value: 自由牌

original.value: Free cards can be used in any progression. Spend them wisely

translation.value: 自由牌可用于在任何情况下推进游戏。好好利用吧。

original.value: Card Tactical Axe

translation.value: 战术斧卡牌

original.value: Collect these cards to get Tactical Axe

translation.value: 收集这些卡牌，获取战术斧。
